Cache.name: Cache
Cache.description:ru: Кэширование данных для предотвращения повторной загрузки

plugins.name: Cache viewed portals on map
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Cache the details of recently viewed portals and use this to populate the map when possible

plugins.name: Pan control
plugins.author: fragger
plugins.description: Show a panning control on the map.

plugins.name: Mini map
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Show a mini map on the corner of the map.

plugins.name: Scale bar
plugins.author: breunigs
plugins.description: Show scale bar on the map.

plugins.name: Zoom slider
plugins.author: fragger
plugins.description: Show a zoom slider on the map instead of the zoom buttons.

plugins.name: Multi Projects Extension
plugins.author: ZasoGD
plugins.description: Create separated projects in some plugins.

plugins.name: Bookmarks for maps and portals
plugins.author: ZasoGD
plugins.description: Save your favorite Maps and Portals and move the intel map with a click. Works with sync. Supports Multi-Project-Extension

Draw.name: Draw
Draw.description: Allow drawing things onto the current map so you may plan your next move
Draw.description:ru: Позволяет рисовать на текущей карте, чтобы вы могли спланировать свой следующий шаг

plugins.name: Done links
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: A companion to the Cross Links plugin. Highlights any links that match existing draw-tools line/polygon edges

plugins.name: Fly Links
plugins.author: Fly33
plugins.description: Calculate how to link the portals to create the largest tidy set of nested fields. Enable from the layer chooser.

plugins.name: Draw tools
plugins.author: breunigs
plugins.description: Allow drawing things onto the current map so you may plan your next move. Supports Multi-Project-Extension.

plugins.name: Cross links
plugins.author: mcben
plugins.description: Checks for existing links that cross planned links. Requires draw-tools plugin.

plugins.name: Tidy Links
plugins.author: boombuler
plugins.description: Calculate how to link the portals to create a reasonably tidy set of links/fields. Enable from the layer chooser. (former `Max Links`)

plugins.name: Highlight portals by my level
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote if the portal is either at and above, or at and below your level.

plugins.name: Highlight portals that need recharging
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote if the portal needs recharging and how much. Yellow: above 85%. Orange: above 70%. Red: above 15%. Magenta: below 15%.

plugins.name: Highlight portals with ornaments
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote portals with additional 'ornament' markers. e.g. Anomaly portals

plugins.name: Hide portal ownership
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Show all portals as neutral, as if uncaptured. Great for creating plans.

plugins.name: Highlight portals based on history
plugins.author: Johtaja
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote the portal has been visited, captured, scout controlled

plugins.name: Highlight high level portals
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote high level portals: Purple L8, Red L7, Orange L6

plugins.name: Highlight portals by level color
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote the portal level by using the game level colors.

plugins.name: Highlight portal weakness
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Use the fill color of the portals to denote if the portal is weak. Stronger red indicates recharge required, missing resonators, or both.

plugins.name: Highlight inactive portals
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote if the portal is unclaimed with no recent activity. Shades of red from one week to one month, then tinted to purple for longer. May also highlight captured portals that are stuck and fail to decay every 24 hours.

plugins.name: Highlight moved portals
plugins.author: screach
plugins.description: Highlights portals with links with different location data

plugins.name: Highlight portals missing resonators
plugins.author: vita10gy
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote if the portal is missing resonators.

plugins.name: Portal count
plugins.author: yenky
plugins.description: Display a list of all localized portals by level and faction.

plugins.name: Localized scoreboard
plugins.author: Costaspap
plugins.description: Display a scoreboard about all visible portals with statistics about both teams,like average portal level,link & field counts etc.

plugins.name: Player level guess
plugins.author: breunigs
plugins.description: Try to determine player levels from the data available in the current view.

plugins.name: Portals list
plugins.author: teo96
plugins.description: Display a sortable list of all visible portals with full details about the team, resonators, links, etc.

plugins.name: Missions
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: View missions. Marking progress on waypoints/missions basis. Showing mission paths on the map.

plugins.name: Available AP statistics
plugins.author: Hollow011
plugins.description: Displays the per-team AP gains available in the current view.

plugins.name: Layer count
plugins.author: fkloft
plugins.description: Allow users to count nested fields

plugins.name: Scoring cycle / checkpoint times
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Show the times used for the septicycle and checkpoints for regional scoreboards.

plugins.name: Find farms on map
plugins.description: Show farms by minimum level

plugins.name: Overlay KML / GPX / GeoJSON
plugins.author: danielatkins
plugins.description: Allow users to overlay their own KML / GPX / GeoJSON files on top of IITC.

plugins.name: Ingress scoring regions
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Show the regional scoring cells grid on the map

plugins.name: Portal Level Numbers
plugins.author: rongou
plugins.description: Show portal level numbers on map.

plugins.name: Machina tracker
plugins.author: McBen
plugins.description: Show locations of Machina activities

plugins.name: Portal Names
plugins.author: ZasoGD
plugins.description: Show portal names on the map.

plugins.name: Ornament icons basic
plugins.author: johtata
plugins.description: Add own icons and names for ornaments

plugins.name: Keys on map
plugins.author: xelio
plugins.description: Show the manually entered key counts from the 'keys' plugin on the map.

plugins.name: Remove extra layers
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Remove 'Artifacts', 'Beacons' and 'Frackers' from layerChooser (still keeping them on map)

plugins.name: Hide portal levels
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Replace all levels with single layerChooser's entry; reverting on longclick

plugins.name: Player activity tracker
plugins.author: breunigs
plugins.description: Draw trails for the path a user took onto the map based on status messages in COMMs. Uses up to three hours of data. Does not request chat data on its own, even if that would be useful.

plugins.name: Ornament icons extended
plugins.author: johtata
plugins.description: Additonal icons and names for beacons

plugins.name: Links to moved portals
plugins.author: screach
plugins.description: Show links to portals with different location data

plugins.name: Zaprange
plugins.author: ZasoGD
plugins.description: Shows the maximum range of attack by the portals.

plugins.name: OpenStreetMap.org map
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Add the native OpenStreetMap.org map tiles as an optional layer.

plugins.name: Kartverket.no maps (Norway)
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Add Kartverket.no map layers.

plugins.name: Stamen.com map layers
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Add the 'Toner' and 'Watercolor' map layers from maps.stamen.com.

plugins.name: Blank map
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Add a blank map layer - no roads or other features.

plugins.name: Yandex maps
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Add Yandex.com (Russian/Русский) map layers

plugins.name: Gaode (高德地图) / AutoNavi map
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Map layers from AutoNavi / Gaode (高德地图)

plugins.name: Bing maps
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Add the bing.com map layers.

plugins.name: Gray Google map
plugins.author: jacob1123
plugins.description: Add a simplified gray Version of Google map tiles as an optional layer.

Portal Info.name: Portal Info
Portal Info.description: Enhanced information on the selected portal

plugins.name: Distance to portal
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Allows your current location to be set manually, then shows the distance to the selected portal. Useful when managing portal keys.

plugins.name: Debug: Raw portal JSON data
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Developer debugging aid: Add a link to the portal details to show the raw data of a portal.

plugins.name: Linked portals
plugins.author: fstopienski
plugins.description: Try to show the linked portals (image, name and link direction) in portal detail view and jump to linked portal on click.  Some details may not be available if the linked portal is not in the current view.

plugins.name: Reso energy % in portal details
plugins.author: xelio
plugins.description: Show resonator energy percentage on resonator energy bar in portal details panel.

plugins.name: Fix maps offsets in China
plugins.author: modos189
plugins.description: Show correct maps for China user by applying offset tweaks.

plugins.name: Periodic refresh
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: For use for unattended display screens only, this plugin causes idle mode to be left once per hour.

plugins.name: Direction of links on map
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Show the direction of links on the map by adding short dashes to the line at the origin portal.

plugins.name: Disable mouse wheel zoom
plugins.author: jonatkins
plugins.description: Disable the use of mouse wheel to zoom. The map zoom controls or keyboard are still available.

plugins.name: Privacy view on Intel
plugins.author: johnd0e
plugins.description: Hide info from intel which shouldn't leak to players of the other faction.

plugins.name: Uniques
plugins.author: 3ch01c
plugins.description: Allow manual entry of portals visited/captured. Use the 'highlighter-uniques' plugin to show the uniques on the map, and 'sync' to share between multiple browsers or desktop/mobile. It will try and guess which portals you have captured from COMM/portal details, but this will not catch every case.

plugins.name: Keys
plugins.author: xelio
plugins.description: Allow manual entry of key counts for each portal. Use the 'keys-on-map' plugin to show the numbers on the map, and 'sync' to share between multiple browsers or desktop/mobile.

plugins.name: Sync
plugins.author: xelio
plugins.description: Sync data between clients via Google Drive API. Only syncs data from specific plugins (currently: Keys, Bookmarks, Uniques). Sign in via the 'Sync' link. Data is synchronized every 3 minutes.

plugins.name: Machina Tools
plugins.author: Perringaiden
plugins.description: Machina investigation tools - 2 new layers to see possible Machina spread and portal detail links to display Machina cluster information and to navigate to parent or seed Machina portal

Obsolete.name: Obsolete
Obsolete.description: Plugins that are no longer recommended, due to being superceded by others or similar
Obsolete.description:ru: Плагины, которые больше не рекомендуются в связи с заменой другими или аналогичными плагинами

Deleted.name: Deleted
Deleted.description: Deleted plugins – listed here for reference only. No download available
Deleted.description:ru: Удаленные плагины – перечислены здесь только для справки. Нет возможности скачать

plugins.name: Debug console tab
plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.description: Add a debug console tab
